channel.title: SystemUpdate Text on server (HOW?)
channel.description:
Yeah, I was inspired by another server having to say 'System update 1:00' and counts down. Can anyone teach me the command and the lines I need to put in client?
Thanks alot

item.title: SystemUpdate Text on server (HOW?)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I didn’t know variables could have/obtain the value false/true?

If you get errors about booleans not being declared in playerHandler class, post again, I’ll give you the booleans to add, or you can add em yourself, you seem pretty self sufficient.[/quote]

item.title: SystemUpdate Text on server (HOW?)
item.dc:creator: @Encouragin Encouragin
item.description:
@Encouragin wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:2, topic:219960”] if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt( command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); //add a global msg? }

Example: In-game you would type:

::update 300, that would be 5 minutes.

So it would say:

System Update: 5:00 and it counts down. THOUGH, when the update is running and people leave the server they cannot come back in until it has reached 0, I recommend counting down from 30 seconds, around there.[/quote]
Zenzie <3

Read full topic

item.title: SystemUpdate Text on server (HOW?)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt( command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); //add a global msg? }

Example: In-game you would type:

::update 300, that would be 5 minutes.

So it would say:

System Update: 5:00 and it counts down. THOUGH, when the update is running and people leave the server they cannot come back in until it has reached 0, I recommend counting down from 30 seconds, around there.

Read full topic
